atmosphere.Name: atmosphere
atmosphere.Description: Checks if the atmosphere is higher than a value

sanity.Name: sanity
sanity.Description: Checks if YandereChan's sanity is higher than a value

yanidle.Name: yanidle
yanidle.Description: Checks if YandereChan is playing the idle animation

yannearpoint.Name: yannearpoint
yannearpoint.Description: Checks if YandereChan is near a point

yanneareditobject.Name: yanneareditobject
yanneareditobject.Description: Checks if YandereChan is near the EditObj

time.Name: time
time.Description: Checks if the current time is between 2 values

dead.Name: dead
dead.Description: Checks if a student is dead

promptpressed.Name: promptpressed
promptpressed.Description: Checks if a specific prompt is being fully pressed

studreputationisabove.Name: studreputationisabove
studreputationisabove.Description: Checks if a student's reputation is above a value

studreputationisunder.Name: studreputationisunder
studreputationisunder.Description: Checks if a student's reputation is under a value

weapon.Name: weapon
weapon.Description: Checks if YandereChan is carrying a specific weapon

weaponequipped.Name: weaponequipped
weaponequipped.Description: Checks if YandereChan is carrying a specific weapon

weight.Name: weight
weight.Description: Checks if YandereChan is carrying the weight

weekday.Name: weekday
weekday.Description: Checks the day of the week

skills.Name: skills
skills.Description: Checks if the grade of a skill is equal to a value

skills2.Name: skills2
skills2.Description: Checks if the grade of a skill is lower than a value

skillslarger.Name: skillslarger
skillslarger.Description: Checks if the grade of a skill is larger or equal to a value

iswet.Name: iswet
iswet.Description: Checks if a student is wet

yanwearing.Name: yanwearing
yanwearing.Description: Checks if Ayano is wearing a certain cloth

inventory.Name: inventory
inventory.Description: Checks the chosen item on Ayano's inventory

money.Name: money
money.Description: Checks if Ayano has a certain amount of money

inview.Name: inview
inview.Description: Checks if a student is in Ayano's view

yanclub.Name: yanclub
yanclub.Description: Checks if Ayano is in a specific club

yanhasmoreitems.Name: yanhasmoreitems
yanhasmoreitems.Description: Checks if Ayano has more of a specific item than a value

yanhaslessitems.Name: yanhaslessitems
yanhaslessitems.Description: Checks if Ayano has less of a specific item than a value

taskisactive.Name: taskisactive
taskisactive.Description: Checks if a specific task is active for a student

indoors.Name: indoors
indoors.Description: Checks if a student is indoors

goingtovomit.Name: goingtovomit
goingtovomit.Description: Checks if a student is about to vomit

burning.Name: burning
burning.Description: Checks if a student is burning

yanuniform.Name: yanuniform
yanuniform.Description: Checks if Ayano is wearing a specific uniform

studuniform.Name: studuniform
studuniform.Description: Checks if a student is wearing a specific uniform

taskcompleted.Name: taskcompleted
taskcompleted.Description: Checks if a student's task is completed

eighties.Name: eighties
eighties.Description: Checks if the game is set in the 1980s

isnight.Name: isnight
isnight.Description: Checks if it is nighttime in the game

abc.Name: abc
abc.Description: Checks if the alphabet mode is enabled

studwearing.Name: studwearing
studwearing.Description: Checks if a specific student is wearing a certain cloth

boolsettings.Name: boolsettings
boolsettings.Description: Checks the status of various boolean game settings

intsettings.Name: intsettings
intsettings.Description: Checks the value of various integer game settings

blonde.Name: blonde
blonde.Description: Checks if the player character has blonde hair

studplayinganim.Name: studplayinganim
studplayinganim.Description: Checks if a student is playing a specific animation

studentwitness.Name: studentwitness
studentwitness.Description: Checks if a student witnessed a specific event type

sleeping.Name: sleeping
sleeping.Description: Checks if a student is tranquilized

missionmode.Name: missionmode
missionmode.Description: Checks if the game is in mission mode
